'''Lost Adventurer''' is an [[achievement]] set in the category ''[[The Chronicles of the Sea of Fog]]''. The achievements are earned by completing Open World mechanism-activated [[Time Trial Challenge]]s on Tsurumi Island in [[Inazuma]].
